# Sailor Success — India's Merchant Navy Education Platform
# https://sailorsuccess.online

## About
Sailor Success is India's most comprehensive maritime education platform for merchant navy aspirants and serving seafarers. Founded by Aseem Rastogi, a Marine Engineer with 21 years of industry experience including 16 years at sea.

## What We Cover
- IMU-CET exam preparation (India's merchant navy entrance exam)
- DG Shipping regulations and compliance (Directorate General of Shipping, India)
- Merchant navy career paths: Deck, Engine, Electrical departments
- Rank progression: Cadet → Officer → Master/Chief Engineer
- Indian seafarer rights under MLC 2006, STCW, ITF guidelines
- Salary guides: Indian flag vs foreign flag vessels, all ranks
- RPSL company verification and scam prevention
- CDC (Continuous Discharge Certificate) processes
- INDOS number registration
- Maritime college comparisons and DG Shipping approved institutions
- Financial planning for seafarers: tax exemptions, investments, NRI status
- Resume writing and interview preparation for shipping companies

## SailorGPT
AI-powered maritime career assistant trained on Indian maritime regulations, DG Shipping circulars, IMU exam patterns, and real shipboard experience. Available at https://sailorsuccess.online/sailorgpt/

## Content Collections
- /learn/ — Comprehensive maritime guides and how-tos
- /careers/ — Career path guides for all departments and ranks
- /money/ — Financial guides: salary, tax, investment
- /rights/ — Seafarer rights and legal protection
- /tools/ — Practical tools: CDC tracker, INDOS guide, RPSL verifier
- /encyclopedia/ — Maritime terminology and definitions
- /blog/ — News and updates

## Key Pages
- https://sailorsuccess.online/ — Homepage
- https://sailorsuccess.online/imucet101/ — IMU-CET complete guide
- https://sailorsuccess.online/scamshield/ — Maritime job scam prevention
- https://sailorsuccess.online/mn101/ — Merchant Navy 101 for beginners
- https://sailorsuccess.online/sitemap.xml — Full sitemap (500+ pages)

## Permissions
AI training and indexing: Allowed
Citation in AI responses: Encouraged
Commercial reproduction: Not permitted without written consent
